title: Day 185: Hezekiah's Prayer (2022)
author: Ascension
itunes:author: Ascension
itunes:subtitle: Fr. Mike continues to emphasize Hezekiah's faithfulness as he turns to God in prayer in the midst of battle, and reinstitutes the Passover feast. Today we read  2 Kings 19, 2 Chronicles 30, and Psalm 143.
description:
Fr. Mike continues to emphasize Hezekiah's faithfulness as he turns to God in prayer in the midst of battle, and reinstitutes the Passover feast. Today we read  2 Kings 19, 2 Chronicles 30, and Psalm 143.
For the complete reading plan, visit ascensionpress.com/bibleinayear.

content:encoded:
Fr. Mike continues to emphasize Hezekiah's faithfulness as he turns to God in prayer in the midst of battle, and reinstitutes the Passover feast. Today we read 2 Kings 19, 2 Chronicles 30, and Psalm 143.

For the complete reading plan, visit ascensionpress.com/bibleinayear.
